Uses of Interface
space.arim.api.chat.MessageBuilder

  • Packages that use MessageBuilder 
    Package Description
    space.arim.api.chat  

    • Uses of MessageBuilder in space.arim.api.chat

      Classes in space.arim.api.chat that implement MessageBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JsonMessageBuilder
      Helper class for creating Messages using JsonComponent.
      class  Message.JsonBuilder
      Identical to JsonMessageBuilder
      class  Message.SimpleBuilder
      Identical to SimpleMessageBuilder
      class  SimpleMessageBuilder
      Helper class for creating Messages.
      Methods in space.arim.api.chat that return MessageBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.add(String text)
      Adds the given text, carrying over previous colouring and formatting.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.append(Component... components)
      Adds more Components
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.append(Component component)
      Adds another Component
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.colour(Colour colour)
      Sets the colour of any future content added with add(String)
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.reset()
      Resets all formatting established.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.style(Style style)
      Adds the specified style for any future content
      default MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.style(Style style, boolean enable)
      Enables the style if specified, otherwise, disables the style.
      MessageBuilder MessageBuilder.unstyle(Style style)
      Removes the specified style for any future content
